headline: Devon Energy (DVN) Suffers a Larger Drop Than the General Market: Key Insights
summary: Devon Energy (DVN) concluded the recent trading session at $34.04, signifying a -1.93% move from its prior day's close.

headline: Oil industry gets $1B tax tweak in GOP’s senate bill
